EmailTemplate.name: PO In Process 2nd Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: PO Status In Process 2nd Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Operations Team:,
Upon confirmation request from {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.SupplierNameLink__c}, regarding {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PONameLink__c}, no response has been given by the primary contact. Please follow up with {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.SupplierNameLink__c} immediately to get written confirmation of PO Completion Date.
{!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PONameLink__c}
Thanks, Ralph the Rooster
